comment: Western governments are the biggest abusers of human rights in the world. That is if you treat the concept properly and not consider promiscuity, sexual perversions and all sorts of kinky fetishes as human right but stick to things like education, housing, decent wages, freedom of religion, protection of traditional family and marriage.

That is if you treat the concept properly and not consider promiscuity, sexual perversions and all sorts of kinky fetishes as human right but stick to things like education, housing, decent wages, freedom of religion, protection of traditional family and marriage.

                  :ARG2 (s3 / stick-01
